page.topic: Specifying High Order Characters in Language Tags
page.description: High order characters are supported in Lanugauge Tags verbatim or HTML endcoded.

discussion.p: Whens strings in a Grid or a UX Component are wrapped with language tags (<a5:r> ... </a5:r>), a Language Definition is required for each supported language. Alpha Anywhere uses the Language Definition to resolve the text to display in the language tags. If the replacement text contains high order characters, the text can be specified directly and does not require HTML encoding the text before entering it in the Language Definitions dialog.
